title: Support app
body: I believed from personal experience that riot should make a LoL Support app for both Android and iOS because if you are like me who for some reason have so many game problems (or you are from Greece ) you will go to lol support a lot of time for both important and silly questions that you want to know the answer but when it comes you won't know because lol support won't pop up or give a notification that someone has answered you question and because of that you might waste another day.

replies.body: That's an interesting idea! While this isn't the right place for a suggestion post like this, I think you've touched on some neat points. I recommend reposting this on the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where suggestions and ideas like this are consolidated. ^.^
Yes, one where riot can automatic close all your tickets.
